name: Pit of Death
description: A deathmatch level for Doom 2(Recamended for DeathMatch 1)This level was made by me, cuz that damn Superman.Wad is nice, but TOO BIG! So, I made this, it has a nice little killing field, plenty of weapons, and health. Everything SHOULD work, if it doesn't, leave E-Mail on Modem Games BBS to Scorpion. Hope u enjoy..(I didn't put monsters in so it's ONLY a DeathMatch level)
